6// Wrapper for Khronos glslang compiler. This file is used by Vulkan and Metal backends.
7//
8
9#ifndef LIBANGLE_RENDERER_GLSLANG_WRAPPER_UTILS_H_
10#define LIBANGLE_RENDERER_GLSLANG_WRAPPER_UTILS_H_
11
12#include <functional>
13
14#include "libANGLE/renderer/ProgramImpl.h"
15
16namespace rx
17{
18enum class GlslangError
19{
20 InvalidShader,
21 InvalidSpirv,
22};
23
24constexpr gl::ShaderMap<const char *> kDefaultUniformNames = {
25 {gl::ShaderType::Vertex, sh::vk::kDefaultUniformsNameVS},
26 {gl::ShaderType::Geometry, sh::vk::kDefaultUniformsNameGS},
27 {gl::ShaderType::Fragment, sh::vk::kDefaultUniformsNameFS},
28 {gl::ShaderType::Compute, sh::vk::kDefaultUniformsNameCS},
29};
30
31struct GlslangProgramInterfaceInfo
32{
33 // Uniforms set index:
34 uint32_t uniformsAndXfbDescriptorSetIndex;
35 uint32_t currentUniformBindingIndex;
36 // Textures set index:
37 uint32_t textureDescriptorSetIndex;
38 uint32_t currentTextureBindingIndex;
39 // Other shader resources set index:
40 uint32_t shaderResourceDescriptorSetIndex;
41 uint32_t currentShaderResourceBindingIndex;
42 // ANGLE driver uniforms set index:
43 uint32_t driverUniformsDescriptorSetIndex;
44
45 uint32_t locationsUsedForXfbExtension;
46};
47
48struct GlslangSourceOptions
49{
50 bool useOldRewriteStructSamplers = false;
51 bool supportsTransformFeedbackExtension = false;
52 bool emulateTransformFeedback = false;
53 bool emulateBresenhamLines = false;
54 bool transformFeedbackEarlyReturn = false;
55};
56
57using SpirvBlob = std::vector<uint32_t>;
58
59using GlslangErrorCallback = std::function<angle::Result(GlslangError)>;
60
61// Information for each shader interface variable. Not all fields are relevant to each shader
62// interface variable. For example opaque uniforms require a set and binding index, while vertex
63// attributes require a location.
64struct ShaderInterfaceVariableInfo
65{
66 ShaderInterfaceVariableInfo();
67
68 static constexpr uint32_t kInvalid = std::numeric_limits<uint32_t>::max();
69
70 // Used for interface blocks and opaque uniforms.
71 uint32_t descriptorSet = kInvalid;
72 uint32_t binding = kInvalid;
73 // Used for vertex attributes, fragment shader outputs and varyings. There could be different
74 // variables that share the same name, such as a vertex attribute and a fragment output. They
75 // will share this object since they have the same name, but will find possibly different
76 // locations in their respective slots.
77 uint32_t location = kInvalid;
78 uint32_t component = kInvalid;
79 // The stages this shader interface variable is active.
80 gl::ShaderBitSet activeStages;
81 // Used for transform feedback extension to decorate vertex shader output.
82 uint32_t xfbBuffer = kInvalid;
83 uint32_t xfbOffset = kInvalid;
84 uint32_t xfbStride = kInvalid;
85 // Indicates that the precision needs to be modified in the generated SPIR-V
86 // to support only transferring medium precision data when there's a precision
87 // mismatch between the shaders. For example, either the VS casts highp->mediump
88 // or the FS casts mediump->highp.
89 bool useRelaxedPrecision = false;
90 // Indicate if varying is input or output
91 bool varyingIsOutput = false;
92 // For vertex attributes, this is the number of components / locations. These are used by the
93 // vertex attribute aliasing transformation only.
94 uint8_t attributeComponentCount = 0;
95 uint8_t attributeLocationCount = 0;
96};
97
98// TODO: http://anglebug.com/4524: Need a different hash key than a string, since
99// that's slow to calculate.
100using ShaderInterfaceVariableInfoMap = std::unordered_map<std::string, ShaderInterfaceVariableInfo>;
101using ShaderMapInterfaceVariableInfoMap = gl::ShaderMap<ShaderInterfaceVariableInfoMap>;
102
103void GlslangInitialize();
104void GlslangRelease();
105
106bool GetImageNameWithoutIndices(std::string *name);
107
108// Get the mapped sampler name after the soure is transformed by GlslangGetShaderSource()
109std::string GetMappedSamplerNameOld(const std::string &originalName);
110std::string GlslangGetMappedSamplerName(const std::string &originalName);
111std::string GetXfbBufferName(const uint32_t bufferIndex);
112
113// NOTE: options.emulateTransformFeedback is ignored in this case. It is assumed to be always true.
114void GlslangGenTransformFeedbackEmulationOutputs(
115 const GlslangSourceOptions &options,
116 const gl::ProgramState &programState,
117 GlslangProgramInterfaceInfo *programInterfaceInfo,
118 std::string *vertexShader,
119 ShaderInterfaceVariableInfoMap *variableInfoMapOut);
120
121void GlslangAssignLocations(const GlslangSourceOptions &options,
122 const gl::ProgramExecutable &programExecutable,
123 const gl::ShaderType shaderType,
124 GlslangProgramInterfaceInfo *programInterfaceInfo,
125 gl::ShaderMap<ShaderInterfaceVariableInfoMap> *variableInfoMapOut);
126
127// Transform the source to include actual binding points for various shader resources (textures,
128// buffers, xfb, etc). For some variables, these values are instead output to the variableInfoMap
129// to be set during a SPIR-V transformation. This is a transitory step towards moving all variables
130// to this map, at which point GlslangGetShaderSpirvCode will also be called by this function.
131void GlslangGetShaderSource(const GlslangSourceOptions &options,
132 const gl::ProgramState &programState,
133 const gl::ProgramLinkedResources &resources,
134 GlslangProgramInterfaceInfo *programInterfaceInfo,
135 gl::ShaderMap<std::string> *shaderSourcesOut,
136 ShaderMapInterfaceVariableInfoMap *variableInfoMapOut);
137
138angle::Result GlslangTransformSpirvCode(const GlslangErrorCallback &callback,
139 const gl::ShaderType shaderType,
140 bool removeEarlyFragmentTestsOptimization,
141 bool removeDebugInfo,
142 const ShaderInterfaceVariableInfoMap &variableInfoMap,
143 const SpirvBlob &initialSpirvBlob,
144 SpirvBlob *spirvBlobOut);
145
146angle::Result GlslangGetShaderSpirvCode(const GlslangErrorCallback &callback,
147 const gl::ShaderBitSet &linkedShaderStages,
148 const gl::Caps &glCaps,
149 const gl::ShaderMap<std::string> &shaderSources,
150 gl::ShaderMap<SpirvBlob> *spirvBlobsOut);
151
152angle::Result GlslangCompileShaderOneOff(const GlslangErrorCallback &callback,
153 gl::ShaderType shaderType,
154 const std::string &shaderSource,
155 SpirvBlob *spirvBlobOut);
156
157} // namespace rx
158
159#endif // LIBANGLE_RENDERER_GLSLANG_WRAPPER_UTILS_H_
